Articles.Content:
I am not talking about WWII. He is.*points finger at Leon*

To remain ontopic: The timeline lore seems intersting. I hope to see how this does in the future.

*looks innocent* I didn't mean it like that! Honest! I'll take it down now okay? And theirs no need to insult other countries ok? Could you list the times the UK ignored the convention out of curiosity?

Edit: There, its removed now. And I'm looking forward to the expansion on the lore section.

I'll probably start with the map next, and fiddle with character portraits while Trekkette writes the profiles and backgrounds.

The vehicles list is going to be a BITCH...

Could you list the times the UK ignored the convention out of curiosity?

1497-1997, half a millennium of British Empire stomping about the planet, at some point you've stepped on toes ;P

On topic: Is it me or is PfL progress increasing much more recently?

Edited May 27, 2013 by LeonG17
It has already been pointed out that that topic is off-topic, please refrain from discussing such politically-charged topics.

On topic: Is it me or is PfL progress increasing much more recently?

Can't be! I've run out of Toblerones!
I know who stole them:

This should restock your inventory.

EDIT: Leon, that was hilarious.

I aim to please.

Why haven't you got a Toblerone factory installed into your house chobit?

I aim to please.

Why haven't you got a Toblerone factory installed into your house chobit?

That building should be your house, Chobit.
Nah, I live on a P-1112 Aigaion Heavy Command Cruiser. I'mma go have a bath then work on the next Lore segment.
So, I just discovered this. Is there more buried in this thread than is on the site?
......whut? XD
I mean, I went to the link from the first page here, but I was wondering if there is stuff in the thread here that didn't get put on the homepage.
See: April 1st gone bad

I mean, I went to the link from the first page here, but I was wondering if there is stuff in the thread here that didn't get put on the homepage.

You're not really missing anything important by not combing through the entire thread.

See: April 1st gone bad

I've always wondered about that but I will never find out.

I've always wondered about that but I will never find out.

Trust me, you don't want to know...
I can explain. You see [censored] followed by [censored] Freya [censored]. And thats all to it
And even if you did, mods are grumpy people

I can explain. You see [censored] followed by [censored] Freya [censored]. And thats all to it

...Well,then.

HEY! They didn't ignore it, the ultimatum was late! D:< Do NOT condemn their actions due to a technicality. Nor should you let me list all the times the UK ignored the convention too!

PfL is a place for rocketry and sexy green ladies, not discussion about WWII, take that to Off-topic and I'll gladly follow and stuff logic and historical fact down your throat

-SNIPED- should keep my mind to my self so i dont get ban by mods D:
Chobit, you seem to have a vendetta against certain mods!
She has a vendetta against everything.
And eveyone
